headline: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Dividend
summary: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: IVR) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.40 per share of common stock for the fourth quarter of 2024. The dividend will be paid on January 24, 2025 to stockholders of record at the close of business on December 30, 2024, with an ex-dividend date of December 30, 2024.

headline: Invesco Canada announces estimated 2024 cash and annual reinvested distributions for its ETFs
summary: Invesco Canada Ltd. ("Invesco") announced today the estimated December 2024 distributions for its exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Unitholders of record on December 30, 2024 will receive cash distributions payable on January 8, 2025.
